title: Divinity Original Sin (1.0.57 To 1.0.67 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here the latest patch for divinity original sin. This patch will upgrade your game version from 1.0.57 to 1.0.67. This patch only works for the gog version of the game. If you want the gog version of divinity original sin. You can find it at the link below. If you have any trouble installing the game or patch. Post a comment below. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed. Also please note, the 1.0.57 patch needs to be installed in order to successfully patch your game to 1.0.67. Again, you can find the 1.0.57 patch at the link below.
